item.title: Building A Dark Mode NPM Package
item.description: I’ve always been a light mode person. I like the cleanliness of it. But I’ve recently developed a fascination with dark mode. It’s a feature which has been getting progressively more accepted into the internet development community. The following products went low light in the last couple years: apple, facebook, youtube, instagram, twitter, gmail, slack, soundcloud, google chrome. Here’s a convenient exhaustive list. So I decided to add dark mode to one of my websites that I knew would get a lot of traction.
